website_summaries.verdict: Different design from most universal lug wrenches that allows you to work fast or with more torque.
pros: When it's time to store this lug wrench, it will break down to a small size that will fit in most storage areas nicely
Can adjust the design to give you more torque or to work with more stability and speed
Includes an extender so you can reach the nuts on deep wheels
Offers four socket sizes ranging from eleven-sixteenths to seven-eighths of an inch (roughly 17 to 22 millimeters)
cons: Carries a higher price point than some others
Won't fit some nuts as tightly as you'd like

customer_reviews.title: Used item?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it looks like it will work for my application. But I received a used (returned?) item. Everything was there, but it wasn't in any factory packaging like in the photo, just loose in a box. And it looked like someone had tested all the sockets. Everything looks OK, so I guess it doesn't matter much. Would have liked to have the instructions that came with the manufacturer's packaging, though.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jeeps
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I thought it would be. Compact and durable. Have a Jeep with 35" tires and deeper than average wheels, extension works great! Storage is limited in Jeep's so this design is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Larry West

customer_reviews.title: A Must In Your Trunk
customer_reviews.text: I've never paid any attention to lug wrenches, but when you own two trailers w/spares - and if you've ever tried to remove a tire or change lug nuts using your OEM wrench - this tool is an absolute must. Great leverage. Makes lug nut removal / install a cinch. Great tool, fits all nuts...no guessing. Recommend a torque wrench to finish the job right.
customer_reviews.author: Roman One

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool..
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in the carport store and really wanted one, but I didn't want to pay what they were selling it for. Came to Amazon and found it considerably cheaper. I've only used it once. But it works terrific you can store the sockets in the handle has plenty of torque to do what you need to do.
customer_reviews.author: Southern border

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea- Too much slop in the joints
customer_reviews.text: Compact, but a little awkward as the extension is a little shorter than needed. It works, but less comfortable than desired. You find yourself protecting you knuckles as is. But very compact with all the pieces. This is nice for storage.
customer_reviews.author: frogfather

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to remove the lug nuts from my wheels that had been over-tightened during the last service. The light-weight wrench that came with the car was inadequate and I was concerned about damaging the lug nuts. this tool worked extremely well in loosening the nuts, providing the extra leverage necessary. The fact that the sockets store in the handle will assure that they are not lost.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: 100 Times Better that the Factory Issued Lug Wrench
customer_reviews.text: This tool allows to easily apply torque on both sides of the lug nut to avoid stripping it. Well made, adjustable, and stows neatly in my Tacoma. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: OverACliff

customer_reviews.title: Handy like it better than a 4 way lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at autozone for twice the price I paid on amazon. Good to have in the car fits all common size lugs. Don't like the caps are plastic but they seem to hold up. Cool item would also work to crack a skull in a pinch lol
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the crappy lug wrench that came w/my Wrangler. Haven't yet used it, but it feels good in my hand and it will give me two gripping points to hold when having to remove lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble getting the original lug nuts off my wheels to install wheel locks, and this tool did it easily. You can disconnect the adapter from the main handle, and use it to hand loosen/tighten the lug nuts. The handle also stores the extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Geocon

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good, but the included extension is not long enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good, but the included extension is not long enough to prevent busting your knuckles on the rim. Get a longer extension and this is excellent
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Only improvement =, which I really think is necessary, is to make the end caps out of metal, and not plastic. This thing gets banged around and won't keep the attachments inside once those endcaps break. The attachments are loose inside and heavy metal, so the plastic doesn't stand a chance long term.
customer_reviews.author: mark twain

customer_reviews.title: Great quality universal lug wrench!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use on our camper tires in case of a flat. My husband likes it so much, he uses it for our other vehicles also instead of others he has.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Does what its suppose to.. Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Needs an extension. Used it to replace my clock spring but I had to loosen the extention to the tip for it to barely reach. Luckily I was able to do it. Will buy a longer extension adapter later on. Haven't tested on tires yet..
customer_reviews.author: Jose Torres

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what it's intended to..
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's intended to do, and for the price you can't really beat it. I would recommend this to anyone who has experienced trouble with other designs. It is universal as well and comes with an extra size for bigger lugs.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Matos

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for every vehicle! I am a female and this made it so much easier to change my tire! I’d recommend having a head lamp and portable tire air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Lourelia C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than your tire iron!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have when a flat happens, very easy to store and use. Purchased 5 for gifts
customer_reviews.author: gregory gedmin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to everyone i know. I had a cop tell me how awesome it was when he was helping me while i was changing my brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Ks buyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a regular lug wrench!
customer_reviews.text: Heavier that I thought it would be but it definitely gives you the ability to improve torque to get the extra push on your lug nuts that you couldn't get with an any regular lug wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I like stopping to help someone and most times it's a flat tire. This wrench breaks loose lug nuts like a power tool. I have received complements and asked where they can get one. In fact my previous one I bought from the local auto part store was stolen, obviously it's quite popular.

customer_reviews.title: Very innovative wrench that allows user to get significant torque ...
customer_reviews.text: Very innovative wrench that allows user to get significant torque and be able to store it in trunk compartment. Most tire wrenches are too big to be stored in the vehicle. Not this one. Much easier that using wrench that comes with factory tire jack
customer_reviews.author: Bonecrusher

customer_reviews.title: keeps the peices together
customer_reviews.text: it is a very handy tool, rugged and with the screw top ends you keep the pieces together...
customer_reviews.author: Donald Eugene Leas

customer_reviews.title: Like the brand ... "Powerbuilt"
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my trailer. Finally I cans use it with the car too. It is heavy, quality seems to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: LyonByCar

customer_reviews.title: Add ratchet adapter
customer_reviews.text: Added a ratchet adapter to this and now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken A.

customer_reviews.title: Best lug wrench out there!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Takes up very little space compared to the normal cross wrench. Super powerful!!
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: The bar definitely give you an advantage for those air ...
customer_reviews.text: The bar definitely give you an advantage for those air ratcheted on lug nuts, my only complaint is the extension needs to be a little longer
customer_reviews.author: MIchael

customer_reviews.title: Great Leverage
customer_reviews.text: I originally found this at an auto parts store. The OEM lug wrench was too short and did not provide enough leverage to loosen my car's lug nuts. This works like a 4 way, but gives you the option for more leverage. It is durable and loosens the lugs easily. I like the tool so much, I bought two more from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cleaver product.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, would have given 5 stars if not for the plastic end caps. Club is heavy duty, plastic end caps are fragile. If you drop the club caps will break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A GREAT ITEM CAN BE USED ALSO FOR FIGHT ZOMBIES IF IT EVER HAPPENS
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my tires you may need a adapter for wide wheels or to hit Zombies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grip
customer_reviews.text: The grip is perfect. The design makes it faster to tighten or untighten. I just wish it was blue instead of red.
customer_reviews.author: Snow_317

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes off the tightest lug nuts. Takes up little room in the trunk. Fits deep well lugs such as those on Mercedes and Ford Expedition
customer_reviews.author: windowman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, offers lots of torque with little effort. Supports most standard lug nut sizes.
customer_reviews.author: tech1098

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Power wrench when you need it to remove your tire.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Fellin

customer_reviews.title: Gives you all the leverage you need with all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives you all the leverage you need with all the different size sockets for every lug nut. The only additional piece it should come with is another extension to keep the second socket from rattling around and for deeper rims.
customer_reviews.author: whompinwoody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product... works exceptionally well. I purchased 4, one for each car!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Nyarady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and adjustable, hope I don't have to use it too soon!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D

customer_reviews.title: It was no better than the lug wrench that came with my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Returned. It was no better than the lug wrench that came with my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one for each vehicle you own
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Strong, with onboard storage and the two double ended sockets fit a wide enough variety of lugs. I own two.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

product_meta.title: Powerbuilt 642284 Billy Club Heavy Duty Universal Lug Wrench
feature_bullets: Universal design fits SAE and metric lug nuts on virtually every passenger vehicle on the road today
Patent-pending design features sliding socket drive head for speed or leverage when needed
Included pair of double sided sockets and extension fit inside handles for easy storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars107 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
